item.title: Can't add barrage runes button? 317 PI
item.dc:creator: @kid2kewl2bereal kid2kewl2bereal
item.description:
@kid2kewl2bereal wrote:

Okay, well, i have a code, but it doesnâ€™t give me my barrage runes or anything for some reason?

case 114119://barrage set if (c.inWild() && c.isBanking) { c.sendMessage("You cannot do this right now"); } else if(c.getItems().freeSlots() <= 3) { c.sendMessage("You need atleast 3 free slot's to use this feature."); } else if (c.getItems().playerHasItem(995, 2000000)) { c.getItems().deleteItem2(995, 2000000); c.getItems().addItem(555,6000); c.getItems().addItem(560,4000); c.getItems().addItem(565,2000); } else { c.sendMessage("You need atleast 2,000,000 coins to use this feature."); } break;

Read full topic
